channel.title: Palo Alto Networks Cloud Services Status - Incident History

item.title: Issues with syncing user id and group information with Cloud Identity Engine
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Prisma Access Notification Sync Issue

Prisma Access Engineering team is aware of issues in notifications impacting the sync of users and groups with Cloud Identity Engine for customers who have between Feb 23 11:55 PM UTC and Feb 24 01:20 AM UTC. The issue impacts Cortex Data Lake onboarded in Americas, causing delays in syncing user and user group information within the Prisma Access Mobile User Gateways and Remote Networks.

Feb 24, 02:35 UTC
Identified - The Prisma Access Engineering team is aware of issues in notifications impacting the sync of users and groups with Cloud Identity Engine for customers who have between Feb 23 11:55 PM UTC and Feb 24 01:20 AM UTC and are actively working to resolve them.

This issue impacts customers whose Cortex Data Lake is onboarded in Americas and given this issue, the users and user group information retrieved/learnt between Feb 23 11:55 PM UTC and Feb 24 01:20 AM UTC will have delays in syncing, within the Prisma Access Mobile User Gateways and Remote Networks.

Our team is committed to restoring full functionality as swiftly as possible and is taking all necessary steps to address this matter.
The next update will be shared by Feb 24, 09:00 AM UTC

item.title: Advanced Threat Prevention (ATP) - Scheduled Maintenance - Global / All Regions
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Planned Service Maintenance

Summary: Advanced Threat Prevention service will undergo maintenance on March 14th, 2024, potentially causing intermittent disconnects across all regions.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 23:00 UTC  -  Mar 15, 03:00 UTC

Feb 23, 05:43 UTC
Scheduled - We have a planned service maintenance for Advanced Threat Prevention on March 14th, 2024 from 23:00 UTC to March 15th, 2024 03:00 UTC. The service maintenance will affect globally / all regions.

Customer Impact: During this scheduled maintenance, customers may experience intermittent disconnects across services as they get upgraded.

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in America Government Region
item.content:encoded:
High - Service Maintenance Scheduled for Cortex XDR, XSIAM, XSOAR 8, XPANSE Summary: Maintenance scheduled for March 3rd, 2024 from 08:00 AM to 03:00 PM UTC in America Government region. Service may be unavailable for a maximum of 30 minutes.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 3, 08:00 - 15:00 UTC

Feb 18, 10:24 UTC
Scheduled - We are planning a service maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in America Government region. The maintenance is scheduled for March 3rd 2024 from 08:00 AM UTC to 03:00 PM UTC March 3rd 2024. During this window, the service may be unavailable for a maximum of 30 minutes. However, if you are experiencing unusual activity in your environment, please contact our Support - https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/company/contact-support.

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in Europe, Germany, Switzerland, Poland, Qatar and United Kingdom Regions
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Service Maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in Europe

Summary: Scheduled maintenance is planned for various regions in Europe, with a potential maximum 30-minute service unavailability window during the specified time frame. If unusual activity is experienced, users are advised to contact support.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 15:00 UTC  -  Feb 26, 00:00 UTC

Feb 8, 10:14 UTC
Scheduled - We are planning a service maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in Europe, Germany, Switzerland, Poland, Qatar and United Kingdom regions. The maintenance is scheduled for February 25th 2024 from 15:00 UTC to 00:00 UTC February 26th 2024. During this window, the service may be unavailable for a maximum of 30 minutes. However, if you are experiencing unusual activity in your environment, please contact our Support - https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/company/contact-support.

item.title: Prisma Cloud Compute Scheduled Release - O’Neal Update 3 (32.03)
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Feb 13, 09:32 UTC
Scheduled - We have a planned minor upgrade for Prisma Cloud Compute to O’Neal Update 3 (32.03) version in the following regions, scheduled for February 25, 2024 from 07:00AM UTC to 11:00AM UTC.

Customers may experience intermittent failures in the Compute feature set during this scheduled maintenance. No other Prisma Cloud Services will be affected.

For more information about the release, please refer to the
Look Ahead—Planned Updates on Prisma Cloud Compute

item.title: Scheduled Maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in America, Canada, Singapore, India, Australia, Taiwan and Japan Region
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 07:00 - 16:00 UTC

Feb 8, 10:12 UTC
Scheduled - We are planning a service maintenance for Cortex XDR / XSIAM / XSOAR 8 / XPANSE in America, Canada, Singapore, India, Australia, Taiwan and Japan region. The maintenance is scheduled for February 25th 2024 from 07:00 AM UTC to 04:00 PM UTC February 25th 2024 . During this window, the service may be unavailable for a maximum of 30 minutes. However, if you are experiencing unusual activity in your environment, please contact our Support - https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/company/contact-support.

item.title: Cortex - Intermittent login Issues in all regions
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 03:12 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 20, 20:30 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 20, 20:10 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 20, 20:07 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing login issues with Cortex Products in all regions.

The current impact is that the Cortex console is not available intermittently.

Cortex XDR agents' local protection continues to function normally.
All data ingestion is unaffected as well.
